Articles.Content:
This is a really strange looking replica of the F-18 Hornet, but to my defense, the f-18 hornet has a short fat design with long thin wings, which ksp doesn't really have anything for. Aside from that it can fly really stable, do some stunts, and it does a good job at being a weapon carrier. I said it is stock even though my preview video uses bd armory, but the craft download doesn't have the weapons. Enjoy the vid

Heres the craft download if you want this jet too:

http://download1351./4w81lciflndg/ct5c5vccy3b53b9/ALLL+OFF+THIS.craft

Edited August 24, 2014 by manni01

Ima put some stock missiles on it.

Oh by the way change your download link to this, skips a process

http://www./download/k0t66n1ibv08gqm/F-18+Hornet.craft
Ok. I'll do that. I see how its better

Oo what version of ksp was it made for?

wont run on .24
maybe I still have some bd armory parts on it. I used ksp 0.24.2 it should work. Also does it not give you the option to load it in the load craft file screen?

Ima put some stock missiles on it.

Oh by the way change your download link to this, skips a process

http://www./download/k0t66n1ibv08gqm/F-18+Hornet.craft

try the download now. Btw i named it specially just to make sure. it should say" all of this "

says "craft not compatible with this version of KSP"

and yeah the option is there, says ^ is all.

says "craft not compatible with this version of KSP"

and yeah the option is there, says ^ is all.

Ok, good that I have a backup of my 0.24 version to test this out. Apparently the f-18 only works with 0.24.2, not with 0.24. Idk how that works
bit of that going atm, i could not get a craft i uploaded from .24 to load after someone else had loaded in .24.2 even though it originally came from .24, weird stuff.

why don't you update?

Oh i have about 10 different versions of KSP lol
